citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process on April 13, 2023 at
12:50 PM. The inspector was informed by a family member that the licensee works a full-time job away from home during
the week. No other authorized person was available for inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process on April 13, 2023 at 
12:50 PM. The inspector was informed by a family member that the licensee works a full-time job away from home during 
the week. No other authorized person was available for inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
